label: AB6C3_cI160_230_b_h_g-001
title: Boropollucite [Cs(Si$_{2}$B)O$_{6}$] Structure
comments:
According to (Bubnova, 2004) the Cs (16b) site is 81.4\% filled, and the Si (48g) site is 65.9\% silicon and 36.5\% boron.  This gives the final stoichiometry of Cs$_{0.814}$B$_{1.095}$Si$_{1.977}$O$_{6}$ 
 Other entries in the ICSD show that the Cs site may also contain calcium. 
 The Wyckoff labels listed in Table 3 of (Bubnova, 2004) are incorrect.  They are corrected in the ICSD entry. 
 The Wyckoff positions in the ICSD differ slightly from the published values. We use the values from the ICSD CIF.
